attr.title: Trigger Rally
attr.desc:
Trigger is a free 3D rally car racing game. Fun for all the family!
Trigger comes with a number of challenges where you have to race several tracks to finish each challenge.
attr.desc_md:
Trigger Rally is a free 3D rally car racing game. Fun for all the family!

The game comes with a number of challenges where you have to race several tracks to finish each challenge. It features realistic 3D graphics, physics-based car handling, and exciting rally racing gameplay.

Trigger Rally is an open-source racing game written in C++ by Jasmine Langridge and Richard Langridge, licensed under the GPL and a BSD-like license.
attr.inst:
Ready to run!
Mouse is invisible but can be navigate trough hovering over the menu items.
attr.inst_md:
Ready to run!

Note: Mouse is invisible but you can navigate through hovering over the menu items.
